name: MS MELODY handmade polymer clay brooch
description:
Mary Poppins sang to make chores more fun, Jack Black turned a prep school class into a sizzling rock band. Music is the salt of life! And trust me, after Ms. Melody comes along, you’ll realize how tasteless it was before! ;)

It measures approx. 2,5 in / 6,5 cm tall.

Whether you admit it or not, the first opinion does count, so your brooch will come to you in a little pouch! 

Please keep in mind that the item pictured above is just a sample, and thus any imperfections that may exist. The one you will get will be made just for you, after you place your order and it may vary slightly from the one pictured above, due to the lighting and my non-professional photographing skills, but also because it will be handmade, one of a kind!  All the items are varnished with satin glaze, so that the colors are protected and they are heat/frost resistant. Also, although I make them as firm as I can, the items can be a little sensitive, since they are made out of polymer clay and are quite thin in order to be light. So, handle them with care and you'll have your little friends with you for a long time! =)

Thanks for stopping by! ^^

name: PARTY MUNSTA! handmade polymer clay brooch
description:
This little pal may fall under the category of MUNSTAS, but he's as cute as can be!!! He's a
